description: Coolo little Bulblins get the good stuff from their King! Biiigggg nice shields look great!
requirementsTooltip: You must select King Bulblin as your hero.
tooltip: Coolo little Bulblins get the good stuff from their King! Biiigggg nice shields look great! (Bulblin Thugs and Bullbo Riders are outfitted with armor and a shield, giving them +3 non magic armor)
